document_data.name: Saern Hill
document_data.mainbody: '''Saern Hill''' was a hill or town somewhere in [[Faerûn]].
document_data.History: In the {{yearlinkName|761}}, [[Elminster Aumar]] offered [[Immeira]] of [[Buckralam's Starn]] his escort to Saern Hill, where she could meet a horse breeder named [[Nantlin]].
